name: Shield Salvation
summary: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack.
description:
You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack. If a shield would be destroyed due to damage taken during your Shield Block, the shield remains intact at 1 Hit Point instead. Its construction is weakened until you take the time to repair it, preventing you from using Shield Salvation to save the same shield until your next preparations.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
